alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 2:14PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 515 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 213 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Whitmore Wash, Rock Canyon, Parashant Wash, Truxton Wash, Hurricane Wash, Cold Spring Wash, Diamond Creek, Langs Run, Peach Springs Wash, Spencer Canyon, Surprise Canyon and Lost Man Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Diamond Creek Campground, Bar Ten Ranch, Toroweap Campground, Peach Springs and Tuweep. - This includes the following roads... Route 66 between mile markers 97 and 106. Mount Trumbull Loop Road near mile marker 52...and near mile marker 57...and between mile markers 61 and 68. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
